title: GHPython does not load using Rhino 8.8
question:
Hi McNeel,


Following the issue I posted here (
GHPython
), I’m reposting it here with additional info


Here is the line I call in the python editor of Rhino (not Grasshopper):


import ghpythonlib.components as ghcomp


Which worked well using Rhino 8.3. After an update to Rhino 8.8, this line gives me.


image
1552×358 23.7 KB
